name: Apple Pie
description: A classic American pie made with fresh apples and a buttery crust.
instructions: Peel, core, and slice the apples into thin wedges.
In a large bowl, toss the apples with sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
Roll out the pie crust and place it in a 9-inch pie dish.
Pour the apple mixture into the crust.
Dot the top of the apples with butter.
Cover the pie with the second pie crust and crimp the edges to seal.
Cut slits in the top of the pie to allow steam to escape.
Bake for 45 to 50 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
description: A quick and easy stir fry that's perfect for busy weeknights.
instructions: Heat the oil in a large skillet over high heat.
Add the chicken and stir fry for 2 to 3 minutes, or until browned.
Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
Add the vegetables to the skillet and stir fry for 2 to 3 minutes, or until tender.
Return the chicken to the skillet and add the soy sauce, hoisin sauce, and garlic.
Stir fry for an additional 1 to 2 minutes, or until heated through.
